allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Miro App for Brianna Dawes Studios

Project management system that transforms Miro boards into a comprehensive 
project management hub for design studios.

Features:
- React 19 + Vite 6 + TypeScript
- Supabase backend with RLS
- Miro SDK v2 integration
- Role-based access (Admin, Designer, Client)
- Real-time sync between DB and Miro boards

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve TypeScript build errors for Vercel deployment

- Fix undefined checks in LoginForm and miroAuthService
- Remove unsupported borderOpacity from Miro SDK styles
- Add initialized property to MiroProjectRowService
- Change JSX.Element to React.ReactElement for type compatibility
- Fix exactOptionalPropertyTypes issues in ProjectForm, ProjectFilters, etc
- Handle Supabase array/object return types in reportService
- Add googleDriveUrl to CreateProjectInput type
- Fix type assertions in useRealtimeSubscription
- Rename ProjectFilters component export to avoid duplicate identifier

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
